thread.title_full: Smart Start, Inc. reviewed by Sergio arambula

author: Sergio arambula
title: Sergio arambula
text: Ive been having issues with my mobile device, and in speaking with Brittany Justice today on 2/27/17, she was very helpful and informative. After speaking with her I feel that the issue can be resolved and becoming more informative on the mobile unit device. I appreciate her assistance, information and customer service. Thank you.
